amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $15 million in reimbursement to the city of Rio Rancho, the county of Benalillo, and the Middle Rio Grande Conservancy District for work done in conjunction with the Army Corps of Engineers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to revise funding levels in the bill by reducing the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Expenses", and increasing the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Construction", by $15 million.

action.text: Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray (NM).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan, Ben Ray (NM) amendment (A055) Failed by voice vote.
